com.sun.java.xml.ns.j2ee
Class ServletLinkType

java.lang.Object
  com.sun.java.xml.ns.j2ee.String
      com.sun.java.xml.ns.j2ee.ServletLinkType

public class ServletLinkType
extends String

The servlet-link element is used in the service-impl-bean element to specify that a Service Implementation Bean is defined as a JAX-RPC Service Endpoint. The value of the servlet-link element must be the servlet-name of a JAX-RPC Service Endpoint in the same WAR file. Used in: service-impl-bean Example: StockQuoteService

Java class for servlet-linkType complex type.

The following schema fragment specifies the expected content contained within this class. 

 <complexType name="servlet-linkType">
   <simpleContent>
     <restriction base="<http://java.sun.com/xml/ns/j2ee>string">
     </restriction>
   </simpleContent>
 </complexType>
